events.message: I want to request a refund for the jacket I bought last week because it does not fit and I no longer want to keep it.
The reported case has been categorized under Refund due to customer requesting a money back for their recent purchase.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's request and follow up accordingly.

Could you please upload a photo showing the jacket with tags and packaging? This will help to process your refund quickly.
I have just uploaded the photos you requested. Please let me know if anything else is needed to proceed with the refund.
Thanks for the photos. We have approved your refund request. Please return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we'll email you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick assistance and will send the jacket back today.
We have marked your refund case as resolved once we receive the returned item. Thank you for your cooperation.
Just checking in to confirm we received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully.
Your refund case is now closed. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us again.
